title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location, the error message 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src' is displayed. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are performed as two separate operations, creating an illegal state when the first operation is set.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the project settings dialog 
2. Navigate to the 'Output Location' tab 
3. Set the output location to a directory that is nested within the source folder 
4. Click on 'Ok' and observe the error message.
